experience.role_description: Analyze internal processes and recommend and implement procedural changes to improve operations in database. Analyze the requirement and make the necessary changes in the existing modules. Support and maintenance of the specific module.

Worked in SDLC and Agile framework. Consistent performance and ownership of the task while maintaining the module in a Data Warehouse project. Interacted with clients during analysis, development, and implementation phases. Conducted training sessions for juniors.

education.description: Electrical & Computer Engineering. Courses: Digital IC and Design, ASIC Design Modelling & Synthesis, Verilog Workshop, Microprocessor System Design, Embedded Systems Design with FPGAs, Pre-silicon Functional Verification.

Electronics & Telecommunications. Core Subjects: Digital Logic Design, Digital Communication, Electronics Devices and Circuits, Analog Digital IC Design Applications, Microprocessor and Micro-controllers.

education.institution: Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education
education.description: Electronics & Communications. Core Subjects: Electronic Components and Devices, Programming in C, Digital Techniques and Microprocessor, Micro-controllers, Digital Communication, Embedded Systems.
